languages.text: "Ты..." {n}Женское лицо смотрит на вас из темноты клетки. Невзирая на то, что половина головы превратилась в месиво костей и опухолей, взгляд единственного глаза на удивление осмысленный.{/n} "Ты обещал! Обещал нам!" {n}Ее голосу вторят другие — из глубин клеток.{/n}

"You..." {n}A female face watches you from within the gloom of the cage. Even though half of her head has been turned into a mess of bones and lumpen growths, her single eye looks at you with a surprising amount of intelligence.{/n} "You promised! You promised us!" {n}Her words are echoed by other voices in the depths of the cages.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты..." {n}Женское лицо смотрит на вас из темноты клетки. Невзирая на то, что половина головы превратилась в месиво костей и опухолей, взгляд единственного глаза на удивление осмысленный.{/n} "Ты обещал! Обещал нам!" {n}Ее голосу вторят другие — из глубин клеток.{/n}

You promised us!" {n}Her words are echoed by other voices in the depths of the cages.{/n}

Even though half of her head has been turned into a mess of bones and lumpen growths, her single eye looks at you with a surprising amount of intelligence.{/n} "You promised! You promised us!" {n}Her words are echoed by other voices in the depths of the cages.{/n}

languages.text: “你……”{n}一张女性的脸从笼子的阴暗处盯着你。尽管她的半颗脑袋已经变成了骨头和肉块，但她残存的眼睛中却带着惊人的知性。{/n}“你答应过我们！你答应过我们的！”{n}她的话引起了笼子深处其他声音的回应。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}A female face watches you from within the gloom of the cage. Even though half of her head has been turned into a mess of bones and lumpen growths, her single eye looks at you with a surprising amount of intelligence.{/n} "You promised! You promised us!" {n}Her words are echoed by other voices in the depths of the cages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你……”{n}一张女性的脸从笼子的阴暗处盯着你。尽管她的半颗脑袋已经变成了骨头和肉块，但她残存的眼睛中却带着惊人的知性。{/n}“你答应过我们！你答应过我们的！”{n}她的话引起了笼子深处其他声音的回应。{/n}

languages.text: «Tú...». {n}El rostro de una mujer te observa desde la penumbra de la jaula. Aunque la mitad de su cabeza ha sido reducida a un amasijo de huesos y tumores, el ojo que le queda te mira con sorprendente intelecto.{/n} «¡Lo prometiste! ¡Nos lo prometiste!». {n}Sus palabras son coreadas por voces que vienen del interior de las otras jaulas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}A female face watches you from within the gloom of the cage. Even though half of her head has been turned into a mess of bones and lumpen growths, her single eye looks at you with a surprising amount of intelligence.{/n} "You promised! You promised us!" {n}Her words are echoed by other voices in the depths of the cages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tú...». {n}El rostro de una mujer te observa desde la penumbra de la jaula. Aunque la mitad de su cabeza ha sido reducida a un amasijo de huesos y tumores, el ojo que le queda te mira con sorprendente intelecto.{/n} «¡Lo prometiste! ¡Nos lo prometiste!». {n}Sus palabras son coreadas por voces que vienen del interior de las otras jaulas.{/n}

languages.text: 「あなた…」{n}檻の中から女性の顔があなたを見ている。頭の半分が骨とゴツゴツした膿でぐちゃぐちゃになっているにもかかわらず、彼女の一つの目は驚くほど知性的にあなたを見ている。{/n}「約束したじゃない！約束したじゃない！」{n}彼女の言葉は、檻の奥で他の声とともに反響する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}A female face watches you from within the gloom of the cage. Even though half of her head has been turned into a mess of bones and lumpen growths, her single eye looks at you with a surprising amount of intelligence.{/n} "You promised! You promised us!" {n}Her words are echoed by other voices in the depths of the cages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなた…」{n}檻の中から女性の顔があなたを見ている。頭の半分が骨とゴツゴツした膿でぐちゃぐちゃになっているにもかかわらず、彼女の一つの目は驚くほど知性的にあなたを見ている。{/n}「約束したじゃない！約束したじゃない！」{n}彼女の言葉は、檻の奥で他の声とともに反響する。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr ..." {n}Ein weibliches Gesicht beobachtet dich aus der Düsternis des Käfigs. Obwohl eine Hälfte ihres Kopfs nur noch ein Durcheinander aus Knochen und klumpigen Auswüchsen ist, liegt in ihrem einzigen Auge überraschend viel Intelligenz.{/n} "Ihr habt es versprochen! Ihr habt es uns versprochen!" {n}Ihre Worte von anderen Stimme in den Tiefen der Käfige wiederholt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}A female face watches you from within the gloom of the cage. Even though half of her head has been turned into a mess of bones and lumpen growths, her single eye looks at you with a surprising amount of intelligence.{/n} "You promised! You promised us!" {n}Her words are echoed by other voices in the depths of the cages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ..." {n}Ein weibliches Gesicht beobachtet dich aus der Düsternis des Käfigs. Obwohl eine Hälfte ihres Kopfs nur noch ein Durcheinander aus Knochen und klumpigen Auswüchsen ist, liegt in ihrem einzigen Auge überraschend viel Intelligenz.{/n} "Ihr habt es versprochen! Ihr habt es uns versprochen!" {n}Ihre Worte von anderen Stimme in den Tiefen der Käfige wiederholt.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous... » {n}Dans l'obscurité de la cage, un visage de femme vous regarde. Bien que la moitié de sa tête ne soit plus qu'un amas d'os et d'excroissances, on décèle une intelligence surprenante dans son œil restant.{/n} « Vous avez promis ! Vous nous avez promis ! » {n}Dans les profondeurs des autres cages, d'autres voix lui font écho.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}A female face watches you from within the gloom of the cage. Even though half of her head has been turned into a mess of bones and lumpen growths, her single eye looks at you with a surprising amount of intelligence.{/n} "You promised! You promised us!" {n}Her words are echoed by other voices in the depths of the cages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous... » {n}Dans l'obscurité de la cage, un visage de femme vous regarde. Bien que la moitié de sa tête ne soit plus qu'un amas d'os et d'excroissances, on décèle une intelligence surprenante dans son œil restant.{/n} « Vous avez promis ! Vous nous avez promis ! » {n}Dans les profondeurs des autres cages, d'autres voix lui font écho.{/n}

languages.text: "Sen..." {n}Bir kadın yüzü, kafesin kasvetinden seni izliyor. Başının yarısı kemik ve şekilsiz öbeklerle dolu. Tek gözü, şaşırtıcı seviyede bir havsala ile sana bakıyor.{/n} "Söz vermiştiniz! Bize söz vermiştiniz!" {n}Cümleleri, kafeslerin derinliklerindeki başka seslerde yankılanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}A female face watches you from within the gloom of the cage. Even though half of her head has been turned into a mess of bones and lumpen growths, her single eye looks at you with a surprising amount of intelligence.{/n} "You promised! You promised us!" {n}Her words are echoed by other voices in the depths of the cages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “Sen...” {n}Bir kadın yüzü, kafesin kasvetinden seni izliyor. Başının yarısı kemik ve şekilsiz öbeklerle dolu. Tek gözü, şaşırtıcı seviyede bir havsala ile sana bakıyor.{/n} “Söz vermiştiniz! Bize söz vermiştiniz!” {n}Cümleleri, kafeslerin derinliklerinde başka seslerde yankılanıyor.{/n}
